content: Which famous English playwright wrote 'A Midsummer Night's Dream', 'Romeo and Juliet' and 'Macbeth'?

The famous English playwright who wrote 'A Midsummer Night's Dream', 'Romeo and Juliet', and 'Macbeth' is William Shakespeare. He is widely regarded as the greatest writer in the English language and is often called England's national poet. His works consist of about 39 plays, 154 sonnets, two long narrative poems, and a few other verses. His plays have been translated into every major living language and are performed more often than those of any other playwright.
